content.trivia: Yellow-cheeked gibbons are diurnal and notoriously early-risers. Each morning, beginning at around sunrise, male and females sing to each other.
content.question: How yellow-cheeked gibon are realted to war in Vietnam?
answers: This is one of the reasons why they going extinct. Napalm bombs, defoliants affected their habitat
They were brought from Vietnam to USA as a mascot

content.trivia: East Javan langurs are picky eaters. They love fresh, young leaves. Because of this inconvenient diet, not many zoos keep East Javan langurs. There are only about 120 of them in Europe.
content.question: Why langurs are vulnerable to extinction?

content.trivia: Binturongs are often described as a keystone species within their ecosystems. They are the only known disperser of strangler fig seeds as they have the digestive enzymes required to soften its seed coat.
content.question: What is attractive for poachers?
answers: They are sold as a pets
